name: CapGunHero
description:
Oh no! Your ship was wrecked and now you're stranded on a mysterious island!

Luckily you've still got your ever-reliable home-made CAP gun and enough stun capsules to knock down a rampaging elephant.

Go, adventurer! Find danger and blast its face in!

Controls
Movement - W, A, S, D
Shooting - Left Click (when cursor is red)
Quit Game - Esc

If in doubt, shoot it!
